bug.short_desc: Virtual keyboard on iOS covers focussed fields

long_desc.thetext:
Since qooxdoo 4.0 the iOS virtual keyboard covers some focussed fields, which did not happen in qooxdoo 3.5.
1. on eg an iPad go to http://demo.qooxdoo.org/3.5/widgetbrowser 2. Make sure your iPad is in landscape mode 3. Click in the text after the text 'TexField' 4. Now the virtual keyboard comes up 5. Now click in the text area behind the text 'TextArea' 6. The keyboard is still visible and the text area is showing 7. Now click in the date field after the text 'DateField' 8. See the keyboard is still showing, and the date field is showing as well. 9. Now go to http://demo.qooxdoo.org/4.0/widgetbrowser and repeat steps 3-7 10. See that now the date field is scrolled behind the keyboard
This is happening since 4.0 and is still present in 4.1
